description: Wasteland is proud to present “Into The Mist” a BDSM themed soap opera with a supernatural twist. In the sixth episode of this series, Chloe and Brad find there is a spark between them during a poolside chat, but unfortunately, Victoria is eavesdropping on them and does not appreciate this development! Victoria confronts Chloe about this, Chloe denies anything is going on, and this results in a trip to the punishment room for a severe beating. In the meantime, Grayson catches Melissa snooping through his books and takes her to task with a controlled orgasm session that poor innocent Melissa is just not quite ready for. Still frustrated, Victoria takes her wrath out on Willy, assisted by Chloe in an athletic bdsm 3-some, complete with strap-on male anal penetration. Originally aired on PinkTV (European Cable) in 2005 (Episode 6 of 9)
title: Into the Mist - Episode 6: Mysteries Everywhere
